snippet: In “Riding the Midnight Express With Billy Hayes,” Mr. Hayes recounts his prison ordeal in Turkey, and how it differed from the Oliver Stone screenplay for the movie.
abstract: Andy Webster reviews one-man show Riding the Midnight Express With Billy Hayes, directed by John Gould Rubin, at St Luke's Theater.
